Package energy.usef.agr.workflow.validate.flexoffer

This package contains the logic to create and send FlexOffer's

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AgrFlexOfferCoordinator
    This coordinater executes the business logic for Creating and Sending FlexOffer's.
    AgrFlexOfferRevocationCoordinator
    Coordinator class for the Aggregator, handling the 'Revoke Flex Offers' workflow.
    FlexOfferDetermineFlexibilityStepParameter
    The defined parameters for the FlexOfferDetermineFlexibilityStepParameter.
    FlexOfferEvent
    The FlexOfferEvent, requires no paramaters.
    FlexOfferEventTrigger
    Timed trigger to fire FlexOfferEvent.
    FlexOfferRevocationEvent
    Event to fire the processes in charge the revocation of Flex Offer.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    FlexOfferDetermineFlexibilityStepParameter.IN
    The ingoing parameters for this step.
    FlexOfferDetermineFlexibilityStepParameter.OUT
    The outgoing parameters for this step.
